patterns: What should I do to start?
What to do first at my new job?
Steps to start at the company
How to start my new job?
responses:
Welcome to the team! To get started, you'll need to complete the following steps: 
1. Fill out your personal information form. 
2. Review the company handbook to understand our policies and procedures. 
3. Set up your work email and necessary tools (e.g., Slack, Salesforce, etc.). 
4. Meet with your supervisor to discuss your role and expectations. 
5. Complete any mandatory training sessions. 
6. Get acquainted with your team and department. 
7. Begin your assigned tasks and projects. 
If you have any questions during the onboarding process, don't hesitate to ask your supervisor or HR for assistance.

patterns: What can I do with Canva?
How do I create a design in Canva?
How do I start with Canva?
responses:
Using Canva is easy and intuitive. Follow these steps to get started: 
1. Sign up or log in to your Canva account at canva.com. 
2. On the homepage, click on the 'Create a design' button. 
3. Choose a template or select a custom size for your project. 
4. Use the drag-and-drop editor to add elements like text, images, icons, and shapes. You can upload your own images or use Canva's extensive library of free and premium elements. 
5. Customize your design by adjusting colors, fonts, and layouts. 
6. Once you're satisfied with your design, click the 'Download' button to save your project in various formats (e.g., PNG, JPG, PDF). 
7. You can also share your design directly from Canva via email or social media. 
Canva offers tutorials and resources to help you make the most of its features, so explore and have fun designing! 

If you want to learn more in depth, check out this guide: [How to Use Canva: A Beginner's Guide](https://www.canva.com/learn/how-to-canva-beginners-guide/).

Slack is a messaging app for teams designed for communication and collaboration. Here's how to get started: 
1. Sign up or log in to your Slack account at slack.com. 
2. Create or join a workspace where your team collaborates. 
3. Create channels for different projects, topics, or teams by clicking on the '+' icon next to 'Channels'. 
4. Send messages within channels to communicate with your team. You can also send direct messages for one-on-one conversations. 
5. Use @mentions to get the attention of specific team members. 
6. Integrate other tools and services (e.g., Google Drive, Trello) to streamline your workflow. 
7. Customize your notifications to stay updated without being overwhelmed. 
8. Use the search bar to find past messages and files quickly. 
Slack is designed to improve team productivity and communication, so explore its features and make the most of it! 

If you want to learn more in depth, check out this guide: [How to Use Slack: Your Quick Start Guide](https://slack.com/help/articles/360059928654-How-to-use-Slack--your-quick-start-guide).

patterns: What can I do with Salesforce?
How to manage leads in Salesforce?
responses:
Salesforce is a powerful customer relationship management (CRM) tool designed to help you manage customer data, track sales, and automate marketing processes. Here's how to get started: 
1. Sign up or log in to your Salesforce account at salesforce.com. 
2. Familiarize yourself with the Salesforce dashboard and key features such as Leads, Accounts, Contacts, and Opportunities. 
3. Manage your leads by entering new leads into the system and tracking their progress through the sales funnel. 
4. Use the Accounts feature to store and manage information about companies you do business with. 
5. Track your sales opportunities by creating and updating opportunities, which represent potential sales. 
6. Customize Salesforce to fit your business needs by creating custom fields, objects, and workflows. 
7. Use reports and dashboards to gain insights into your sales performance and customer interactions. 
8. Integrate Salesforce with other tools and services you use, such as email, calendars, and marketing automation platforms. 
Salesforce offers a wide range of tutorials and resources to help you master its features and improve your sales processes. 

If you want to learn more in depth, check out these workshops: [Salesforce Workshops for Small Businesses](https://www.salesforce.com/solutions/small-business-solutions/workshops/).

patterns: What are the tasks of an Amazon researcher?
What does an Amazon researcher do?
responses:
An Amazon researcher is responsible for analyzing market trends, researching product opportunities, tracking competitors, and optimizing product listings. Here are the key tasks: 
1. Conduct market analysis to identify trends and potential product opportunities. 
2. Use tools like Jungle Scout and Helium 10 to gather data and insights on products and competitors. 
3. Research and analyze competitors' products, pricing, and marketing strategies. 
4. Optimize product listings by improving titles, descriptions, keywords, and images to increase visibility and sales. 
5. Monitor and analyze sales performance and customer feedback to make data-driven decisions. 
6. Stay updated with Amazon's policies and best practices to ensure compliance. 
7. Collaborate with other teams, such as marketing and supply chain, to support product launches and promotions. 
An Amazon researcher plays a crucial role in helping businesses succeed on the platform by providing valuable insights and recommendations.

patterns: What can I do with Notion?
How do I create a page in Notion?
How do I start with Notion?
responses: Notion is an all-in-one workspace that lets you manage tasks, projects, and notes. To get started, sign up or log in to your Notion account at notion.so. Create a new page by clicking on 'New Page' and choose a template or start from scratch. Use blocks to add text, images, lists, and more. You can create databases to organize information and link between pages. Explore Notion's features and make your workspace work for you. For more, visit [Notion Guides](https://www.notion.so/guides).

patterns: What can I do with HubSpot?
How do I manage leads in HubSpot?
How do I start with HubSpot?
responses: HubSpot is a powerful CRM tool that helps you manage your contacts, track sales activities, and automate marketing efforts. To get started, sign up or log in to your HubSpot account at hubspot.com. Import your contacts, create deals, and use HubSpot's marketing tools to nurture leads. You can customize HubSpot to fit your business needs by creating custom fields, workflows, and reports. For more information, visit [HubSpot Academy](https://academy.hubspot.com/).

patterns: Guide me on using Microsoft Teams
What can I do with Microsoft Teams?
How do I create a team in Microsoft Teams?
How do I start with Microsoft Teams?
How to use Microsoft Teams meetings?
Using Microsoft Teams like a pro
responses: Microsoft Teams is a collaboration tool that integrates with Office 365. To get started, sign up or log in to your Microsoft Teams account at teams.microsoft.com. Create or join a team, set up channels for different topics, and use chat, video calls, and file sharing to collaborate. You can schedule meetings, share files, and integrate with other Office 365 apps. Learn more at [Microsoft Teams Help](https://support.microsoft.com/teams).

patterns: What can I do with Zoom?
How do I create a meeting in Zoom?
How do I start with Zoom?
How to use Zoom breakout rooms?
responses: Zoom is a video conferencing tool that allows you to host and join online meetings. To get started, sign up or log in to your Zoom account at zoom.us. Schedule a meeting by clicking on 'Schedule a Meeting' and filling in the details. You can invite participants by sending them the meeting link or ID. During the meeting, you can share your screen, use breakout rooms, and record the session. For more information, visit [Zoom Help Center](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us).

patterns: What can I do with Trello?
How do I create a board in Trello?
How do I start with Trello?
responses: Trello is a visual project management tool that uses boards, lists, and cards to help you organize tasks. To get started, sign up or log in to your Trello account at trello.com. Create a new board, add lists for different stages of your project, and create cards for tasks. You can assign tasks to team members, set due dates, and use labels to categorize tasks. For more, visit [Trello Guide](https://trello.com/guide).
